TopicTitle: Mig-25 extended replica (now it is space plane with 4700+ deltaV on board)

Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemen, let me introduce new generation of legendary Mig-25 plane - space plane Mig-25SS

Equipped VTOL system for light planets and moons (Dune and lighter), safe landing system with additional wheels at the tail and wings of craft. Empty craft is a good glider.

![2GyRVh4h.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2GyRVh4h.jpg)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ErQnO)

Download link: [http://www./download/4sk8077fvfr04k9/Mig-25+SS.craft](http://www./download/4sk8077fvfr04k9/Mig-25+SS.craft)

Flight instruction:

1. Press button "0", then full thrust and press stage button

2. Take off speed is 95-100 m/s

3. Set pith to 50 after take off and wait until you reach 20 km, then pith 25 until 30 km, then pith 10 until your reach 31-32 km of altitude and vertical speed ~10 m/s

4. Accelerate until you reach 2050-2100 m/s of surface speed at altitude 33-34 km (pith 0...20)

5. Pith to 10 and start increase vertical speed, start gently decrease throttle from 35 km (1/6 of thrust per kilometer), at 2/3 of thrust start atomic engine, when one jet will be starved of air stop turbojets and closing intakes by pressing "1" button

6. Set desired apoapsis, then in apoapsis make circular orbit
